SELECT
* FROM (SELECT N.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM (SELECT
T.GEN_ID, T.COLM_ID, T.FORM_NO, T.COLM_TYP_CD, T.COLM_NM, T.ITEM_NM, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM WF_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = T.RESC_ID AND LANG_TYP_CD = NVL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) AS ITEM_RESC_NM, T.RESC_ID, T.SORT_ORDR, T.USE_YN, T.LST_YN, T.DEPLOY_YN, T.JSON_PATH,
FROM WF_FORM_COLM_LWF_FORM_COLM_H T
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ORDER BY T.SORT_ORDR ASC
) N WHERE ROWNUM <= #{pageNo, jdbcType=NUMERIC} * #{pageRowCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC}) WHERE RNUM > (#{pageNo, jdbcType=NUMERIC} - 1) * #{pageRowCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} ) M
